IBM (2017 - Present)

Web Developer

At IBM, I have been working on many projects as The Internet Of Things, Cloud, GARS, I.T infrastructure, MarketPlace, etc.

  • Developed animated pages using Greensock, Jquery, HTML and CSS.
  • Created pages using gamefication concepts.
  • Agile methods for all the projects (Scrum).
  • Created dynamic pages using technologies like vue.js.
  • Maintained all the projects updated on GIT.

Reactor Digital (2015 - 2016)

PHP, Flash and HTML 5 developer

At Reactor Digital I developed animated banners, websites, games and worked with optimization.

  • Developed animated banners for the Qantas website, using the technologies Adobe Animate, greensock, AcionScript 3 and JavaScript.
  • Created games using the tool Construct 2 to export for Web and Mobile.
  • WebSites optimization, reducing the image sizes and improving the JS Code.
  • Worked with people from all around the world, being my first experience working abroad.
  • Maintained all the projects updated on GIT.

Agencia Vision Comunicação (2014 - 2015)

PHP, Flash and HTML 5 developer

At Vision Comunicação I developed animated banners and mobile apps.

  • Developed Apps, using the technologies HTML and JavaScript in PhoneGap and ActionScript 3 to export for mobile in Adobe Air.
  • PHP and MySQL queries to create the communication between the APPs and the DataBase.

Aliança Brasil-Japão (2018 - 2022)

Japanese language

Japanese Language Literatures

Learning the japanese language.

Droid Digital Mídia (2013 - 2014)

PHP, Flash and HTML 5 developer

At Droid Digital Mídia I developed WebSites, Games, Apps, desktop software and managed databases.

  • Developed Apps, using the technologies HTML and JavaScript in PhoneGap and ActionScript 3 to export for mobile in Adobe Air.

City Institute (2015 - 2016)

CERTIFICATE IV IN WEB-BASED TECHNOLOGIES

Webmaster

HTML, CSS, JavaScript, php, mySQL and cyber security.
